DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate diabetes data management program hand potential user , health care professional lay user .
DOC.detailed_description: Diabetes data management program analyze blood glucose result download glucose meter assist health care professional lay user manage diabetes . During study , subject download meter , generate print report , evaluate program 's ease use , verify understand program output .
DOC.criteria: Health Care Professionals : 1 . Must experience use diabetes data management software medical office download meter , review report ( computer screen printout ) , assist patient ' diabetes disease management use software . 2 . May include : endocrinologist , primary care physician , nurse educator , medical staff involve download meter interpret data output . Lay user must : 1 . Be least 18 year age . 2 . Have diabetes ( parent legal guardian child diabetes ) test blood sugar home least twice daily one month . 3 . Be able speak , read understand English . 4 . Currently use diabetes management software home familiar diabetes management software . At least 75 % subject must use software least one month . 5 . Have experience use PC program browse internet . Persons work competitive medical device company .
